name: continuity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 the fact of something continuing for a long period of time without being changed or stopped: There has been no continuity in that class - they've had six different teachers.
theatre & film
  specialized the way in which different parts of a film or television programme are joined together so that the action happens without any pause or change
